Notes.Text:
This update for graphviz fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-11023: Fixed a denial of service vulnerability, which was caused by a NULL pointer dereference in agroot() (bsc#1132091).

Vulnerabilities.Description: The agroot() function in cgraph\obj.c in libcgraph.a in Graphviz 2.39.20160612.1140 has a NULL pointer dereference, as demonstrated by graphml2gv.
